message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000 for it. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $10,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still looking to keep my investment within $10,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
